original_text: David also won a battle against the Moabites. They were now under David's authority and they paid taxes to him.
korean_text: 또 모압을 치매 모압 사람이 다윗의 종이 되어 조공을 바치니라

sentences.original_text: They were now under David's authority
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이제 다윗의 권위 아래 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and they paid taxes to him
